alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Cobb; Forsyth; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 3:48PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cherokee, western Forsyth, northeastern Cobb and northeastern Fulton Counties through 415 PM EST... At 348 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Lebanon, or 7 miles south of Canton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Canton, Cumming, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Milton, Duluth, Woodstock, Sugar Hill, Holly Springs, Free Home, Hickory Flat, Drew, Union Hill, Sweat Mountain, Coal Mountain, Brookwood, Birmingham, Lebanon and Holbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
